Detailed Description

template<typename Elt, char ID>
class e2c2::Curve< Elt, ID, 2 >

Base "class" (really class template) for Edwards Curves involving two parameters.

Curve

Template Parameters:
Elt field element
ID character id of curve
Collects all relevant information about the curve and provides basic functionality
